column4: I would like to use my secondary drive to store data from both windows and ubuntu files. Sounds like it needs to be formatted FAT.  Is there a backup program that anyone can recommend suited for this application?
OK, so if I format it NTFS, which backup program could copy the data from Ubuntu to the drive ActionParsnip  (or anyone else who might know)?
can you install rsync on a data hard drive with no OS ActionParsnip ?
if you are backing up to ntfs you are better off using a tool that creates tarballs the deja dup backup should do that for you
